main event: Two pilots observed a bright blinking white light in the sky while flying a T-33 aircraft on 24 February 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,The light was first spotted by Lt. Marsden at an angle of 10 degrees from their position,The object was round and about the size of a dime at arm's length,The object appeared to be stationary initially but then moved away when the pilots attempted to approach it,No significant traffic or other aircraft were observed in the area at the time of the sighting.
location: Webb AFB, Big Spring, Texas, USA
witness description: Captain B. Brown, age 38, T-33 instructor pilot; Lt. John R. Marsden, age 24, navigator pilot
